mapper.select: select post_number, post_thumbnail , post_title, post_content from tbl_post where post_number = #{postNumber}

select oi.order_number, oi.order_item_quantity, i.ingredient_price * oi.order_item_quantity as order_item_price, o.order_date, o.order_status, i.ingredient_name, o.user_number, ii.ingredient_image_system_name from tbl_order o join tbl_order_item oi ON o.order_number = oi.order_number join tbl_ingredient i ON oi.ingredient_number = i.ingredient_number left join tbl_ingredient_image ii ON i.ingredient_number = ii.ingredient_number where o.user_number = #{userNumber} order by order_number limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
select count(o.order_number) from tbl_order o join tbl_order_item toi on o.order_number = toi.order_number and user_number = #{userNumber}
